sqlMap.select: SELECT MIN(POLICY_ID) FROM GIPI_POLBASIC WHERE LINE_CD =NVL(?,LINE_CD) AND SUBLINE_CD = NVL(?,SUBLINE_CD) AND ISS_CD = NVL(?,ISS_CD) AND ISSUE_YY = NVL(?,ISSUE_YY) AND POL_SEQ_NO = NVL(?,POL_SEQ_NO) AND RENEW_NO = NVL(?,RENEW_NO)

SELECT MIN(a.POLICY_ID) FROM GIEX_EXPIRY a WHERE a.LINE_CD =NVL(#lineCd#,a.LINE_CD) AND a.SUBLINE_CD = NVL(#sublineCd#,a.SUBLINE_CD) AND a.ISS_CD = NVL(#issCd#,a.ISS_CD) AND a.ISSUE_YY = NVL(#issueYY#,a.ISSUE_YY) AND a.POL_SEQ_NO = NVL(#polSeqNo#,a.POL_SEQ_NO) AND a.RENEW_NO = NVL(#renewNo#,a.RENEW_NO) AND (SELECT extract_user from giex_expiry where policy_id = a.policy_id) = #userId# AND a.POLICY_ID NOT IN(SELECT policy_id FROM gipi_polbasic WHERE pol_flag = '4') AND a.POLICY_ID NOT IN(SELECT policy_id FROM gipi_polbasic WHERE pol_flag = '5')

SELECT a.POLICY_ID FROM GIEX_EXPIRY a, gipi_polbasic b WHERE a.policy_id = b.policy_id AND a.policy_id = #policyId# AND a. extract_user = #userId# AND b.cred_branch IN (SELECT ISS_CD FROM TABLE (line_iss_adhoc_pkg.get_adhoc_issource(#userId#,#tranCd#))) AND b.pol_flag NOT IN ('4','5')

SELECT a.policy_id FROM GIPI_POLBASIC a, GIEX_EXPIRY b WHERE a.LINE_CD =NVL(?,a.LINE_CD) AND a.SUBLINE_CD = NVL(?,a.SUBLINE_CD) AND a.ISS_CD = NVL(?,a.ISS_CD) AND a.ISSUE_YY = NVL(?,a.ISSUE_YY) AND a.POL_SEQ_NO = NVL(?,a.POL_SEQ_NO) AND a.RENEW_NO = NVL(?,a.RENEW_NO) AND a.ENDT_YY = 0 AND a.ENDT_SEQ_NO = 0 AND a.policy_id = b.policy_id
